title: sfang
author: sfang
content: As my favorite site "preev.com" seems to be down(entirely terminated?) since a few days ago, I now found a clone site that's basically doing the same thing so I'm happy but really wish to know what happened to that site as it was my go-to site whenever i wanted to check value and to see how much i would send etc.Where do you check btc value and converter to fiat currencies?Thanks in advance

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: No idea what happened to previous.com, but here’s a handy site ..https://preecs.coolstorage.org/This was developed by a member of the forum too - ZipReg  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1239916

comments.author: sfang
comments.body: Quote from: Mbitr on August 12, 2022, 07:30:05 PMNo idea what happened to previous.com, but here’s a handy site ..https://preecs.coolstorage.org/This was developed by a member of the forum too - ZipReg  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1239916thanks for the reply, I might just go with googles own search "btc value", the first that comes up is their own converter and value and you can also see the fiat price and conversions there.Regarding your link it seems okay, though it only shows the USD fiat.Someone mentioned to be wary regarding sites that just shows the values due to hijack attacks and what not, even if I don't consider it a huge risk it might be a good practice to not go to any site.Maybe I could do it for my own sake, like an small app as a project for myself.Thought preev was such a good site as it always was reliable of the current prices and it was always there and people since 10 years used it always.

comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: I just google "btc price" or "ltc price". Not sure why preev has been going down lately, but that was my favorite.
